mapper.update: update sys_user set password = #{pass} ,pwd_reset_time = #{lastPasswordResetTime}, is_account_non_locked = 1, is_account_non_expired = 1, is_credentials_non_expired = 1, pwd_fails_count = 0, is_must_reset_pwd = 0, is_tip_reset_pwd = 0 where username = #{username}
update sys_user set is_must_reset_pwd = 1 where username = #{username}
UPDATE sys_user SET is_account_non_expired = 0 WHERE is_admin = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, last_login_time, SYSDATE()) >= #{days}
UPDATE sys_user SET is_credentials_non_expired = 0 WHERE is_admin = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, pwd_reset_time, SYSDATE()) >= #{days}
UPDATE sys_user SET is_must_reset_pwd = 1 WHERE is_admin = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, pwd_reset_time, SYSDATE()) = #{days}
update sys_user set email = #{email} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u, sys_users_roles r WHERE u.id = r.user_id AND r.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT t.id, t.username, t.nick_name, t.gender, t.phone, t.email, t.enabled FROM sys_user t INNER JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON t.id = sur.user_id WHERE sur.role_id = #{roleId}
AND ( t.username like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.phone like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.email like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') )

SELECT t.id, t.username, t.nick_name, t.gender, t.phone, t.email, t.enabled FROM sys_user t WHERE t.id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM sys_users_roles sur WHERE sur.role_id = #{roleId})
AND ( t.username like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.phone like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') OR t.email like CONCAT('%', #{blurry}, '%') )
